bs-visualeditor-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of visual editor extension
prefs-visualeditor:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for visual editor section in preferences.\n
{{Identical|VisualEditor}}
bs-visualeditor-save-message:
Text for saved revision at $1 with summary "$2". 
* $1 is the date when revision was created 
* $2 is the summary of the revision
bs-visualeditor-contenttable:
Text for content. "Content" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|Content}}
bs-visualeditor-contenttable-black:
Text for content (black). "Content (black)" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|Content}}
bs-visualeditor-contenttable-blue:
Text for content (blue). "Content (blue)" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|Content}}
bs-visualeditor-contenttable-darkblue:
Text for content (darkblue). "Content (darkblue)" is the name of a table styling. 
{{Identical|Content}}
bs-visualeditor-cuscosky:
Text for cusco sky. "Cusco Sky" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|cusco sky}}
bs-visualeditor-casablanca:
Text for casablanca. "Casablanca" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|casablanca}}
bs-visualeditor-greyscale:
Text for greyscale. "Greyscale" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|Greyscale}}
bs-visualeditor-greyscale-narrow:
Text for greyscale (narrow). "Greyscale (narrow)" is the name of a table styling.
{{Identical|greyscale (narrow)}}
bs-visualeditor-switch-noeditor-desc: Text for disables the visual editor on this page.
